issue.title: C++/Python: Support Timestamp Data Type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-242](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-242). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for passing timestamps to Arrow. As Pandas and Arrow do not have a common time unit, at the moment this will be a lossy conversion that the user must explicitly acknowledge.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-242?focusedCommentId=15443974) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 107
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/107>
